1.0.0.name: wordpress/shutterpro
1.0.0.description: Using our simple [shutterpro] shortcode, you can use the ShutterPro for Wordpress plugin to display any of your photographs direct on your own Wordpress Blog without the need for any technical knowledge...all you need is your photo set ID which can easily be obtained from your browsers URL while looking at your photo sets on http://www.shutterpro.co.uk
